title: U.S. announces new Russian sanctions, plans to admit thousands of Ukrainian refugees
content:
1. U.S. announces new Russian sanctions, plans to admit thousands of Ukrainian refugees  NBC News
  2. Biden says Russia should be booted from G-20; Russia's economy has shrunk in half since invading Ukraine: Live updates  USA TODAY
  3. US to take in up to 100,000 Ukrainian refugees, sanction Russian officials, companies: LIVE UPDATES  Fox News
  4. President Biden, your administration needs your help to aid Ukrainians | TheHill  The Hill
  5. Biden Admin Looks To Expedite Resettlement Of Ukrainian Refugees In U.S.  NBC News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
